name: Re:Live (Ciber_Turtle, HappyGamer500)
description: You are playing as Jeffery, a boy who wants to get out of the dungeons he woke up in. Thankfully, a golden ghost helped him out by giving him the powers to summon ghosts to help him out. The game is a puzzle platformer where you have to do actions, rewind, and then a ghost will repeat those actions. You will use this ability to open doors and turn off spikes.
